name: Zenith Zebra Bloom
description: The Zenith Zebra Bloom is a symbol of elegance and exotic charm. Its zebra-striped leaves make a bold statement.

name: Celestial Monstera
description: The Celestial Monstera, with its celestial-like splits, is a cosmic addition to your decor. It's a touch of the cosmos at home.

name: Succulent Symphony
description: The Succulent Symphony is a harmonious ensemble of vibrant succulents. These little wonders will serenade your space.

name: Emerald Serenade
description: The Emerald Serenade plant boasts lush, emerald-green leaves that dance in the breeze. This plant is a serene melody of nature.

name: Mystic Moonflower
description: Next-gen gaming console for immersive gameplay.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-gen gaming console for immersive gameplay.
